summary: Retexture of the daedric quiver to match the daedric bow and the rest of the vanilla daedric armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+2]Daedric Arrows and Quiver Retextured[/size][/center]
[center]by DonkelOktor[/center]


[center]My other Skyrim mod:[/center]
[center][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3258]Detailed Dragonborn Iron Armor[/url][/center]


[size=+2]--Description--[/size]
New texture of the daedric quiver which matches the daedric bow and the rest of the vanilla daedric armor. Looks good on dragon armor and others as well if u don\'t like daedric armor. 

[size=+2]--Installation--[/size]
Use 7zip or WinRar to extract.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

[size=+2]--Uninstallation--[/size]
Remove the following files:

Data\\textures\\weapons\\daedric\\daedricarrow
Data\\textures\\weapons\\daedric\\daedricarrow_n

[size=+2]--Credits--[/size]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim

[size=+2]--Distribution Permission--[/size]
You may use the content for your own mods, permission from me is required.
You may not redistribute this mod in any way or claim it as your own.
author: DonkelOktor
